metadata.title: CVE-2016-3169 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The User module in Drupal 6.x before 6.38 and 7.x before 7.43 allows remoteattackers to gain privileges by leveraging contributed or custom code thatcalls the user_save function with an explicit category and loads all rolesinto the array.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
